bibl.title: From Coma to Constellation: Callimachus, Catullus, and Catasterism.
bibl.note: Aetia IV, fr. 110 Pf. (Coma Berenices), 55-64: observations on some details of the catasterism and suggestions for the texts of Callimachus and Catullus (Carm. 66).
bibl.seg: MATTHEWS Victor J., From Coma to Constellation: Callimachus, Catullus, and Catasterism.
